name: Floppy (Crazypirate)
description:
Hello guys, This is Floppy, a  2d roguelike game.

The goal is to flop down on the carrots and remain the combo and reach the last level.

Can you make it to the last level?

Music by: 

www.soundcloud.com/mattpatwalsh

https://matt-patrick-walsh.itch.io/

Coding by: 

https://crazypirate.itch.io/
